title: Andrea Leadsom – 2014 Comments on Government Selling Holding of Tier 1 Notes to Virgin Money
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Andrea Leadsom, the then Economic Secretary to the Treasury, on 25 July 2014.
content:
I can confirm today that we have sold our holding of Tier 1 notes, issued by Virgin Money for £154.5 million. This represents good value for the taxpayer and the money will be used to reduce the national debt.
